mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
